member.name: T:InterfaceBooster.LibraryPluginApi.Static.IStaticExtension
member.summary: Must be imlemented by classes that provide some static functions or variables

member.name: P:InterfaceBooster.LibraryPluginApi.Static.IStaticExtension.Namespace
member.summary: Gets a dot-separated path used to address all static functions and variables from this extension. It may not contain any white spaces or special chars that are not allowed in synery identifiers. Example: "Helpers.DataType.Strings"

member.name: T:InterfaceBooster.LibraryPluginApi.Static.StaticFunctionAttribute
member.summary: Is used to mark a method as static function. The method must be public.

member.name: M:InterfaceBooster.LibraryPluginApi.Static.StaticFunctionAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Is used to mark a method as static function. The method must be public.

member.name: M:InterfaceBooster.LibraryPluginApi.Static.StaticFunctionAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Is used to mark a method as static function. The method must be public.
member.param: An alternative name for the function. (default = name of the method)

member.name: P:InterfaceBooster.LibraryPluginApi.Static.StaticFunctionAttribute.AlternativeIdentifier
member.summary: Gets or sets an alternative name for the function. (default = name of the method)

member.name: T:InterfaceBooster.LibraryPluginApi.Static.StaticVariableAttribute
member.summary: Is used to mark a property as static variable. At least the getter or the setter of the property must be public.

member.name: M:InterfaceBooster.LibraryPluginApi.Static.StaticVariableAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Is used to mark a property as static variable. At least the getter or the setter of the property must be public.

member.name: M:InterfaceBooster.LibraryPluginApi.Static.StaticVariableAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Is used to mark a property as static variable. At least the getter or the setter of the property must be public.
member.param: An alternative name for the variable. (default = name of the property)

member.name: P:InterfaceBooster.LibraryPluginApi.Static.StaticVariableAttribute.AlternativeIdentifier
member.summary: Gets or sets an alternative name for the variable. (default = name of the property)
